text: x<HPA>z<TIP>w^on `o<SIL>bad@yA<ATN>h k*o<SIL>h='Amar<TLP> '<HPA>donA<AZL>y y@hwi<GER>h lE<SIL>'<HSE>d<RBM>w^om S@mw*`A<AZL>h SAma<GER>`@nw* me'e<MEH>t y@hwAh<PAS> w@Yiyr<PAS> b*ag*w^oyi<MUN>m Sul*A<ZQP>x q<TEB>w*mw* w@nAq<MER>w*mAh `AlE<TIP>yhA lam*il@xAmA<SIL>h:
hin*e<MER>h qATo<TEB>n n@tat*i<TIP>ykA b*ag*w^oyi<ATN>m b*Az<MER>w*y 'at*A<TIP>h m@'o<SIL>d:
z@d<MEH>w^on lib*@kA<PAS> hiW/*.iy'E<ZQP>kA So<SIL>k@ni<MER>y b@xag@wey=sE<TIP>la` m@r<MUN>w^om Sib@t*<ATN>w^o 'ome<MUN>r b*@lib*<ZQP>w^o mi<MER>y y<SIL>w^oride<TIP>niy 'A<SIL>rEY:
'im=t*ag@b*i<MUN>yh*a k*an*E<ZQP>SEr w@'im=b*e<MER>yn k*<SIL>w^okAbi<TIP>ym Wi<MUN>ym qin*E<ATN>kA miW/*.A<MER>m 'w^ori<SIL>yd@kA<TIP> n@'um=y@hwA<SIL>h:

'im=g*an*Abi<MEH>ym b*A'<SIL>w*=l@kA<PAS> 'im=S<MUN>w^od@dey la<ZQP>y@lAh 'e<MUN>yk@ nid@me<ZQP>ytAh h<HPA>l<MER>w^o' yig@n@b<TIP>w* d*ay*A<ATN>m 'im=b*o<SIL>Y@riym<PAS> b*A<MUN>'w* lA<ZQP>k@ h<HPA>l<TIP>w^o' yaS@'i<MER>yrw* `o<SIL>lel<SIL>w^ot:
'e<YET>yk@ nEx@p*@W<MUN>w* `eWA<ZQP>w nib@`<TIP>w* maY@p*unA<SIL>yw:

`a<SIL>d=hag*@b<MUN>w*l Sil*@x<RBM>w*kA k*o<YET>l 'an@Se<MUN>y b@riytE<ZQP>kA hiW/*.iy'<TEB>w*kA yA<SIL>k@l<MER>w* l@kA<TIP> 'an@Se<MUN>y S@lomE<ATN>kA lax@m@kA<RBM> yAWi<MEH>ymw* mAzw^or<PAS> t*ax@t*E<ZQP>ykA 'e<MER>yn t*@bw*nA<TIP>h b*<SIL>w^o:
h<HPA>l<TEB>w^o' b*ay*<MER>w^om hah<TIP>w*' n@'um=y@hwA<ATN>h w@ha<SIL>'<HPA>bad@t*i<MEH>y x<HPA>kAmiym<PAS> me<SIL>'<HSE>d<ZQP>w^om w*t@bw*nA<TIP>h meha<MER>r `eWA<SIL>w:
w@xat*<MER>w* gib*w^orE<TIP>ykA t*eymA<ATN>n l@ma<DAR>`an yik*A<SIL>rEt='i<TEB>yS meha<MER>r `eWA<TIP>w miq*A<SIL>TEl:
me<SIL>x<HPA>ma<TEB>s 'Axi<MER>ykA ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<TIP>b t*@kas*@kA<MUN> bw*SA<ATN>h w@nik@ra<TIP>t*A l@`w^olA<SIL>m:

b*@yw^om<PAS> `<HPA>mA<SIL>d@kA<MUN> min*E<ZQP>gEd b*@y<TEB>w^om S@b<MER>w^ot zAri<TIP>ym xeyl<ATN>w^o w@nAk@ri<GAR>ym b*A<MUN>'w* S@`ArA<RBM>w w@`al=y@r<SIL>w*SAla<AZL>im<PAS> yad*<MUN>w* gw^orA<ZQP>l g*am='at*A<TIP>h k*@'axa<MER>d mehE<SIL>m:

w@'al=t*e<MEH>rE' b@yw^om='Axi<AZL>ykA<PAS> b*@y<MUN>w^om nAk@r<ZQP>w^o w@'al=t*iW@ma<MER>x lib@ne<SIL>y=y@hw*dA<TIP>h b*@y<MUN>w^om 'Ab@dA<ATN>m w@'al=t*ag@d*e<MER>l p*i<TIP>ykA b*@y<MER>w^om YArA<SIL>h:

'al=t*Ab<MEH>w^o' b@Sa<SIL>`ar=`am*iy<PAS> b*@y<MUN>w^om 'eydA<ZQP>m 'al=t*e<DAR>rE' gam='at*A<TEB>h b*@rA<SIL>`At<TIP>w^o b*@y<MUN>w^om 'eyd<ATN>w^o w@'al=t*iS@la<MER>x@nAh b@xeyl<TIP>w^o b*@y<MER>w^om 'eyd<SIL>w^o:
w@'a<SIL>l=t*a`<HPA>mod<PAS> `al=hap*E<ZQP>rEq l@hak@ri<TIP>yt 'Et=p*@liyTA<ATN>yw w@'al=t*as@g*e<MER>r W@riydA<TIP>yw b*@y<MER>w^om YArA<SIL>h:
k*i<SIL>y=qAr<MER>w^ob yw^om=y@hwA<TIP>h `al=k*Al=hag*w^oyi<ATN>m k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MEH>r `AWi<AZL>ytA<PAS> ye`A<MUN>WEh l*A<ZQP>k@ g*@mu<SIL>l@kA<TIP> yAS<MER>w*b b*@ro'SE<SIL>kA:
k*i<RBM>y k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MEH>r S@tiytEm<PAS> `al=ha<MUN>r qAd@Si<ZQP>y yiS@t*<MER>w* kA<SIL>l=hag*w^oyi<TIP>m t*Ami<ATN>yd w@SAt<MUN>w* w@lA`<ZQP>w* w@hAy<TIP>w* k*@l<MER>w^o' hAy<SIL>w*:
w*b@ha<MER>r Yiy*<TEB>w^on t*i<SIL>h@yE<MER>h p@leyTA<TIP>h w@hA<MUN>yAh qo<ATN>dES w@yA<SIL>r@Sw*<PAS> b*e<MUN>yt ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<ZQP>b 'e<TIP>t mw^orA<SIL>SeyhE<SIL>m:

w@hAyAh<TLP> beyt=ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<AZL>b 'e<GER>S w*be<DAR>yt yw^ose<MUN>p lE<SIL>hAbA<RBM>h w*be<MEH>yt `eWAw<PAS> l@qa<ZQP>S w@dA<SIL>l@q<MER>w* bAhE<TIP>m wa<SIL>'<HPA>kAl<ATN>w*m w@lo<SIL>'=yi<SIL>h@yE<MEH>h WAriyd<PAS> l@be<MUN>yt `eWA<ZQP>w k*i<MER>y y@hwA<TIP>h d*ib*e<SIL>r:

w@yA<SIL>r@S<AZL>w* han*E<GER>gEb 'Et=ha<MUN>r `eWA<RBM>w w@haW/*.@pelAh<PAS> 'Et=p*@liS@t*i<ZQP>ym w@yA<SIL>r@Sw*<PAS> 'Et=W@de<MUN>h 'Ep@ra<ZQP>yim w@'e<TIP>t W@de<MUN>h So<SIL>m@r<ATN>w^on w*bin@yAmi<TIP>n 'Et=hag*il@`A<SIL>d:

w@gAlu<MUN>t ha<SIL>xel=ha<TLM>z*Eh lib@ne<AZL>y yiW@rA'e<MEH>l '<HPA>SE<SIL>r=k*@na`<HPA>niym<PAS> `ad=YA<MUN>r@pa<ZQP>t w@gAlu<MER>t y@r<SIL>w*SAla<TIP>im '<HPA>SE<MUN>r b*is@pAra<ATN>d yi<SIL>r@S<ZQM>w* 'e<TIP>t `Are<MER>y han*E<SIL>gEb:
w@`Al<MEH>w* m<SIL>w^oSi`iym<PAS> b*@ha<MUN>r Yiy*<ZQP>w^on liS@p*o<TIP>T 'Et=ha<MUN>r `eWA<ATN>w w@hA<SIL>y@tA<MER>h la<SIL>yhwA<TIP>h ham*@lw*kA<SIL>h:
